definition: one of the main longitudinal beams or plates of the hull of a vessel, to walk as if unable to control one's movements
details:
noun
- one of the main longitudinal beams or plates of the hull of a vessel
- the median ridge on the breastbone of birds that fly
- a projection or ridge that suggests a keel
verb
- to walk as if unable to control one's movements
= synonyms: lurch
